message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with the problem of data selection in statistical machine translation. The use of a neural network classifier also suggests that it could belong to the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Additionally, the use of neural networks for classification could also suggest that it could belong to the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision) as neural networks are commonly used in image classification tasks.
